statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_type = 'Environmental' AND inspector_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM regulatory_audits WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' AND audit_type = 'Compliance Audit';
DELETE FROM audit_details WHERE audit_id = 100 AND date_created < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM inspection_details WHERE inspection_id = 200 OR location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM inspection_details WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_id = 100 AND audit_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE monitoring_id = 500 AND monitor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Audit WHERE audit_id = 100 AND audit_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM InspectionDetails WHERE inspection_id = 200 AND inspection_question LIKE '%safety%';
